<line: 31> Dear Clerk:

[TEXT]
<line: 33> Enclosed is a certified copy of the Transfer Order from the Judicial Panel on Multidistrict.
<line: 34> Litigation (MDL Panel) transferring the above-entitled action to the Northern District of Illinois,.
<line: 35> Eastern Division, where it has been directly assigned to Judge Rebecca R. Pallymeyer.

[TEXT]
<line: 37> Upon entry of this letter and the MDL CTO, please electronically transmit your court file to the
<line: 38> United States District Court, Northern District of Illinois. Your prompt attention to this matter is.
<line: 39> greatly appreciated.

[TEXT]
<line: 41> Sincerely,
